credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Design for a monument
medium: Black chalk, pen and nk, brush bistre wash, on paper
description: A pedestal stands in front of a niche, flanked by pilasters shaped like gaines and showing cherubim in the capitals. Two angels, one of whom is flying, support a medallion portrait of the pope. His coat of arms is in front of the pediment. The scale is at the left edge.
name: Drawing
